developer.name: Arjun Kumar
developer.title: Full Stack Web Developer
developer.tagline: Building dynamic and scalable websites with passion
developer.summary: With over 12 years of hands-on experience in full stack web development, I specialize in creating high-performance, scalable web applications using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js. I have led multiple enterprise-level projects, worked with cross-functional teams, and delivered solutions that enhance business outcomes and user experience.

projectData.title: Enterprise Resource Planning System
projectData.description: Developed a scalable ERP platform for manufacturing industries using Java Spring Boot, Angular, and PostgreSQL. Integrated inventory, finance, HR, and CRM modules with role-based access control.

projectData.title: AI-Powered Chat Support Platform
projectData.description: Built a real-time customer support system using React, Node.js, and Socket.IO with NLP integration to auto-suggest responses and ticket categorization using Python.

projectData.title: E-Commerce Marketplace
projectData.description: Designed and implemented a full-stack e-commerce solution with microservices architecture using Next.js, NestJS, MongoDB, and RabbitMQ. Integrated payment gateways, review systems, and vendor dashboards.

projectData.title: DevOps CI/CD Automation
projectData.description: Led CI/CD automation using Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions across 10+ microservices, reducing deployment time by 70% and improving system reliability.

projectData.title: Real-Time Stock Market Dashboard
projectData.description: Developed a real-time trading dashboard using React, Redux, WebSockets, and Chart.js to display dynamic financial data, analytics, and personalized user portfolios.

projectData.title: Mobile App for Logistics Tracking
projectData.description: Built a React Native-based mobile app for a logistics firm that includes live tracking, delivery updates, and push notifications using Firebase and Google Maps API.

certificates.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
certificates.description: Validated advanced technical skills and experience in designing distributed applications and systems on the AWS platform.

certificates.title: Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) – Scrum Alliance
certificates.description: Earned expertise in agile leadership, Scrum practices, and team facilitation for enterprise-level product development.

certificates.title: Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer
certificates.description: Demonstrated ability to design, build, and manage data processing systems and ensure data-driven decision making on GCP.

certificates.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
certificates.description: Specialized in designing cloud and hybrid solutions on Microsoft Azure, including compute, network, storage, and security.

certificates.title: TOGAF® 9 Certified – The Open Group
certificates.description: Acquired enterprise architecture skills to align IT strategy with business goals using TOGAF framework.

testdata.name: Mr. Ramesh K.
testdata.feedback: With over 12 years in the industry, Arjun has demonstrated exceptional skill in architecting scalable front-end solutions and leading agile teams. His ability to adapt to new technologies and mentor juniors is commendable.

testdata.name: Ms. Latha Devi
testdata.feedback: Arjun's deep understanding of web development and user interface design has made him a go-to expert in our organization. His contributions to enterprise-level projects over the past 12 years have been instrumental to their success.

testdata.name: Dr. N. Vikram Raj
testdata.feedback: Having worked with Arjun on multiple digital transformation projects over the last decade, I can confidently say his technical leadership, problem-solving ability, and attention to performance optimization are top-notch. He brings clarity and vision to complex frontend challenges.

responsibilities: Led the architecture and development of enterprise-level React applications
Improved performance and reduced page load time by 45% using code splitting and lazy loading
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Developed responsive UI components for eCommerce and fintech platforms
Collaborated with UX teams to improve user journeys
Migrated legacy jQuery codebases to modern JavaScript frameworks
Built custom CMS and dashboard tools for small and mid-sized businesses
Integrated RESTful APIs and improved frontend-backend communication
Maintained cross-browser compatibility and responsive design standards
